summary: y’all
body:
y’all

it’s been confirmed by one of the producers that far from home takes place minutes after endgame, but we’re almost certain that one of the main plot points in avengers 4 will be time travel

so what if ffh takes place before infinity war, and europe was the field trip that peter was coming home from?

blog.name: sirrius-illustrations
blog.title: Sirrius illustrations
blog.description: J'ai 23ans, je suis normand et J'ai été mordu par un geek . C'est comme pour Spider-man 🕷 sauf que moi je partage mes passions sur la toile !

summary:
Salut la compagnie !
Moi c'est Sirrius ! Mais mon vrai prénom c'est Axel ! J'ai 23ans et j'aime de nombreuses choses !...
body:
Salut la compagnie !

Moi c'est Sirrius ! Mais mon vrai prénom c'est Axel ! J'ai 23ans et j'aime de nombreuses choses ! L'histoire, la littérature, le surf, le cinéma et surtout l'univers geek !

Ici je vous présenterai mon monde et donc mes passions

✌️

blog.name: bluestaratsunrise
blog.title: BlueStarAtSunrise
blog.description:
Angbang/Melron Discord: https://discord.gg/6Ezc22P

Nature & animal lover. I post about issues I care about (Chronic Illness, GLBTQ & Disability rights, among many others), and lots of fandom stuff. Part of Loki’s Army

Fan of: Doctor Who, Good Omens, The Silmarillion, Tolkien's Legendarium, LOTR, AHS Murder House & Apocalypse , Star Wars, Star Trek, The Marvel Universe, Game Of Thrones, Harry Potter, The Fantastical Beasts Series, The Hunger Games, Twin Peaks, Westworld, OUAT (seasons 1-3A.) I tend to sympathize/empathize with villains/anti-heros/antagonists with complex characteristics & tragic backstories (doesn’t mean I condone all of their actions). If this is a problem for you, you probably shouldn’t follow me. FYI, I do sometimes post smut. Bi, disabled, cis female Tolkien Ship Names: https://bluestaratsunrise.tumblr.com/post/179517011918/tolkien-fandom-ship-names

My favorite ships are: Angbang/Melron, Russingon, Gigolas, BagginsShield, Rumbelle, Grindeldore, Bellamort, Harry/Ginny, Ron/Hermione, some versions of Silvergifting, and both Loki and Michael Langdon with many characters. Fan of: Robert Carlyle, Tom Hiddleston (Hiddlestoner), Cody Fern, Chris Hemsworth, Idris Alba, RDJ, Chris Evans, Brie Larson, Jason Isaacs, Sebastian Stan, Jason Mamoa.

If you try to bully me or my friends, I won’t put up with it. I will call you out and publicly mess with you. Haters will drop kicked. If you’re a bully type, you’re better off not engaging me. Avatar art by melkorts4; Header image art by artano-al & public domain pictures

summary:
I figured out the secret truth between hardcore comic fans and the ones who are casual.
Casual: well in the canon this thing...
body:
I figured out the secret truth between hardcore comic fans and the ones who are casual.


Casual: well in the canon this thing happened and it’s the immutable truth.


Hardcore: in the canon nothing is real, everything has happened at once, backstory means nothing, time is a lie we told to god so we could feel good about ourselves.

reblog.comment:
I figured out the secret truth between hardcore comic fans and the ones who are casual.


Casual: well in the canon this thing happened and it’s the immutable truth.


Hardcore: in the canon nothing is real, everything has happened at once, backstory means nothing, time is a lie we told to god so we could feel good about ourselves.

trail.content_raw:
I figured out the secret truth between hardcore comic fans and the ones who are casual.


Casual: well in the canon this thing happened and it’s the immutable truth.


Hardcore: in the canon nothing is real, everything has happened at once, backstory means nothing, time is a lie we told to god so we could feel good about ourselves.
trail.content:
I figured out the secret truth between hardcore comic fans and the ones who are casual.


Casual: well in the canon this thing happened and it’s the immutable truth.


Hardcore: in the canon nothing is real, everything has happened at once, backstory means nothing, time is a lie we told to god so we could feel good about ourselves.

blog.name: lostonmyroad
blog.title: A Lone Wanderer On The Road Of Life
blog.description:
Feel free to message me!

Prompts are open!

summary: How about spideytorch fluff number 12 ‘how did you get in here?’
question: How about spideytorch fluff number 12 ‘how did you get in here?’
answer:
He bursts into his room with so much force that the door rebounds off the wall and hits him in the face. He absolutely does not spend thirty seconds trying not to hold back tears. He kicks aside the clothes on the floor and makes his way to his bed. It’s been a long day, and he can’t wait to sleep.


He pulls back the covers on his bed and collapses into in, falling into a dreamless sleep.


When he wakes up, the sunlight is coming in through the open window, and birds are singing, and Spider-man is sitting in his swivel chair by his desk. Wait.


He screams so loudly that Spider-man jumps onto the ceiling in panic. He’s dropped the magazine he’d been reading and is hanging upside down on his ceiling.


“How did you get in here?” he asks. Well, yells.


Spider-man just points at the open window. Johnny stares back at him, mouth hanging open. Spider-man shrugs.


Johnny throws his hands up in the universal gesture for why because he can’t wait to hear this story.


Spider-man unglues himself from the ceiling and lands so that he’s standing in front of him. He’s rubbing the back of his head rather sheepishly.


“I found a lead on the villain we’ve been tracking,” he gets out, “and I just thought you might want to know.”


Johnny resists the urge to bang his head against the wall. “We were rivals literally two weeks ago. Why are you like this.” The last part comes out as more of a statement than a question.


Spider-man winces. “That was…admittedly my fault.”


Johnny crosses his arms.


Spider-man crosses his too, and Johnny can only imagine he’s pouting under the mask. “It was your fault too! You’re the one who insisted on showing off!”


“Oh yeah, well you—you—”


Spider-man mimics checking the time on his wrist. “I haven’t got all day, torch.”


Johnny throws his hands in the air in frustration. Then an explosion sounds. It’s close enough to the Baxter building that they feel the shake. Spider-man clutches his head, and Johnny rushes over. He’s unsure of what to do, doesn’t know where to put his hands, or what’s wrong.


“You good, buddy?”


Spider-man groans. “Yeah, just the Spider-sense going off. Too much at once.” He shakes his head before straightening. Johnny watches him carefully. Spider-man gives himself one final moment before looking up at Johnny again.


“You look so concerned,” he says, failing to hide the laugh.


“Only because I’d have to drag your ass out of here if you collapsed,” Johnny mutters under his breath. “And Sue would yell at me.”


“Ready to go?” Spider-man asks, voice full of energy. Johnny nods, and they leap out the open window together.



(Listen established relationship fluff is good and all but you can pry the rivals to friends to lovers trope out of my cold dead hands)

Hope you enjoyed it!

summary:
Peter. P: There's some extra web fluid on the counter, you can grab it as you walk out
Miles: Thanks Dad
Miles: ... Why is...
body:
Peter. P: There's some extra web fluid on the counter, you can grab it as you walk out
Miles: Thanks Dad
Miles: ... Why is everyone staring at me?
Gwen: You just called Peter dad. You said 'thanks dad'
Miles: What? No I didn't, I said 'thanks man'
Peter. P: Do you see me as another father figure Miles?
Miles: No, if anything I see you as a brother figure cause you're always bothering me
Noir: Hey show your father some respect

blog.name: virovac
blog.title: Monsters and Junk
blog.description: Explanation for Tags: #silly  is things meant in jest, #ridiculous for things that are real but unintentionally funny

summary: Peter and MJ are canonically kinky. I’ve heard her referred to as “Spider-Man’s Alfred”.  My mind is now going to her greeting...
body:
Peter and MJ are canonically kinky.

I’ve heard her referred to as “Spider-Man’s Alfred”. 

My mind is now going to her greeting Peter as “Master Parker” while in a butler outfit.

I bless/curse you with this thought.

blog.name: lixxen
blog.title: Of Enternal Nightmares and Enternal Demons
blog.description:
Sel - 17 - Male - Taken.
This is a shit ton of Avengers, Venom, and anime.

tags: this is way too thought out
summary:
Hi so it's late and I was looking through the Harley Keener tag. I saw he is gonna be in endgame and got excited. 
So I really...
body:
its almost 1am, so bear with me guys.

Hi so it’s late and I was looking through the Harley Keener tag. I saw he is gonna be in endgame and got excited.


So I really want him and Peter to meet and become the number one stress in Tony’s life because wow. They shouldn’t be paired as a team.


WARNING: IT IS LATE. 1AM. I HAD 4 HOURS OF SLEEP LAST NIGHT. TAKE THIS WITH A PINCH OF SALT. ITS JUST RAMBLING.


So I got thinking. How old is Harley Keener?


So for this, I used two timelines. This and this.

So if they’re not toooo accurately. Bare with me.


So let’s establish a few points that we DO know.


  • Iron Man 3 (Harley’s MCU Debut) was in 2012.
  • His LITTLE sister is 6.
  • Spider-Man HoCo is in 2020 (or 8 years after The Avengers, which is in 2012.)
  • Peter is about 16, maybe 15, in HoCo and IW.
  • Harley looks 8 to 10 in 2012, and confirmed 6<.

So just by this we can figure out:

  • Peter is born in 2004.
  • Harley’s sister is born in 2006.
  • Harley is 2002 to 2004.


Ages of them in 2012:


  • Peter: 8
  • H’s Sister: 6
  • Harley: 6<, most likely 8-10


So knowing this, it means that Harley would be 16 to 18 in the current timeline.


But I noticed one thing. I looked up the Stark Expo Attack, where Peter was notably saved by Tony. That’s in 2010. So Peter is around 6. Makes sense. (Unless he went with his parents, which I dont remember. I’ve heard so many different ages where they die. But a common I’ve heard is four?)


So I was curious and clicked on Peter’s official wiki for that page and scrolled through. I didnt read his description until afterwards, but this small part caught me off guard:




It caught me off guard in all honesty. Was my timeline wrong?




It would explain why his passport doesn’t have a year. It could just be to leave it up to when you’re watching it. Them being lazy. Or maybe just not wanting to clear up plot loopholes? I dont know.


So I went back up and looked at his description.




Welp. Yup. That confirms it. He IS 16. But my dates are a bit off. But then I noticed that poor baby Peter Parker died months before his birthday. Probably about five or four months. Which sucks. He was almsot 17.


Okay, but back to the new knowledge based off the wiki. We can assume that HoCo takes place in 2017, the beginning of his school year. I’m pretty sure hes with the same class, but if we are to assume the timeline and give a bit of flexibility. It was months between HoCo and IW, and Peter was 16 in HoCo. Which meant that he was in fact in the same grade as he was when he died. If that makes sense?


So let’s base everything around IW (even though I want it to be HoCo because that’s Peter’s first movie. But we gotta go to the closest movie.)


Now at this point, we already know their ages and confirmed Peter’s age to be correct.


So if IW is in 2018, that means that:


  • Peter is born in 2001.
  • H’s Sister is born in 2003.
  • Harley is born from 1999 to 2001.


It’s kind of annoying that a lot of sources say one thing, then another say something else. All it does is just shift around the time, but it kinda just throws everything into a loop.


(A side note is though, I laughed when I saw Peter was born in 2001 on the wiki and the timelines all say HoCo is in 2020. Which would make Peter a 19 year old in a sophomore/junior class. I dont know. Its literally 1am.)


I turn 18 this year, and it warms my heart how young they are. Especially with the times lines up to ours.
